value.desc: The `type` is dependent on the `view` property

view.desc: This determines the type of scroller to be used

bar-color.desc: This is the color of the middle bars. It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

border-color.desc: This is the color of outside border when `no-border` property is not `true`. It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

color.desc: This is the color of the background (header and footer). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

text-color.desc: This is the color of the text (header and footer). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

inner-color.desc: This is the color of the background (scroller area). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

inner-text-color.desc: This is the color of the text (scroller area). It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

error-color.desc: This is the error color of the background (end inner section) when end section is less than start section. It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

error-text-color.desc: This is the error color of the text (end inner section) when end section is less than start section. It can be from the Quasar color palette or a CSS hash value (ie: '#0000FF')

dense.desc: If the component should be in dense mode

disable.desc: If the component should be disabled

rounded-border.desc: If the component should have rounded corners

no-border.desc: If the component should not have a border

no-shadow.desc: If the component should not display shadow when header/footer are displayed

no-header.desc: If the component should not display the header

no-footer.desc: If the component should not display the footer

value.desc: This is the value that will be emitted when selected. It is also used for display, when the optional `display` property is not available

noCaps.desc: If set to true, the displayed text will not be converted to uppercase

iconRight.desc: Optional icon to be used on the right of the displayed text

disabled.desc: When set to true the item will be disabled

align.desc: How the text will be aligned within its area

locale.desc: Changes the locale used for the header

am-pm-labels.desc: This is an array of two strings to replace the AM/PM labels. Only applcable when the `hour12` property is used

hour-interval.desc: Used to create intervals. For instance, if '2', then every other value will be displayed

minute-interval.desc: Used to create intervals. For instance, if '2', then every other value will be displayed

disabled-hours.desc: Hours that should be disabled (always use 0 through to 24)

disabled-minutes.desc: Minutes that should be disabled (always use 0 through to 59)

start-am-pm-labels.desc: This is an array of two strings to replace the AM/PM labels. Only applcable when the `hour12` property is used

end-am-pm-labels.desc: This is an array of two strings to replace the AM/PM labels. Only applcable when the `hour12` property is used

start-hour-interval.desc: Used to create intervals. For instance, if '2', then every other value will be displayed

end-hour-interval.desc: Used to create intervals. For instance, if '2', then every other value will be displayed

start-minute-interval.desc: Used to create intervals. For instance, if '2', then every other value will be displayed

end-minute-interval.desc: Used to create intervals. For instance, if '2', then every other value will be displayed

start-disabled-hours.desc: Hours that should be disabled (always use 0 through to 24)

end-disabled-hours.desc: Hours that should be disabled (always use 0 through to 24)

start-disabled-minutes.desc: Minutes that should be disabled (always use 0 through to 59)

end-disabled-minutes.desc: Minutes that should be disabled (always use 0 through to 59)

disabled-years.desc: Array of years that should be disabled

disabled-months.desc: Array of months that should be disabled

disabled-days.desc: Array of days that should be disabled

start-disabled-years.desc: Array of years that should be disabled

end-disabled-years.desc: Array of years that should be disabled

start-disabled-months.desc: Array of months that should be disabled

end-disabled-months.desc: Array of months that should be disabled

start-disabled-days.desc: Array of days that should be disabled

end-disabled-days.desc: Array of days that should be disabled

input.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

invalid-range.desc: Emitted when an end range value is less than the start range

value.desc: An object containing the current start and end ranges

close.desc: Emitted when button on footer is clicked

header.desc: Used to replace the header, when displayed

value.desc: When view is 'string', the returned value is the selected string value. For views of 'date', 'time' and 'date-time', the returned value is a timestamp object. For views of 'time-range' and 'date-range' the returned value is an array of timestamp objects

footer.desc: Used to replace the footer, when displayed

value.desc: When view is 'string', the returned value is the selected string value. For views of 'date', 'time' and 'date-time', the returned value is a timestamp object. For views of 'time-range' and 'date-range' the returned value is an array of timestamp objects
